https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aPYtRdJwt85OgZIUBZ5tHgmfyCO.jpg An Iranian family survives the shah and the ayatollah and moves to France. This story follows the family through it all. Despite the politics, revolution, prison, beatings, assassinations and suicides this is a comedy. All Three of Us
